sub_topic: Prove that the empty set is a subset of every set.
message_1: Let A = {2, 4, 6}. Determine whether the empty set is a subset of set A.
message_2: Yes, the empty set is a subset of set A. The empty set, denoted as âˆ… or {}, is a subset of every set, including set A. This is because there are no elements in the empty set that are not in set A (or any other set).
